title: Evaluation of macro and microminerals in crude drugs and infusions of five herbs widely used as sedatives
cleaned_text: Roberto G.](/vufind/Author/Home?author=Pellerano%2C+Roberto+G.) - Año de publicación - 2011 - Idioma - inglés - Tipo de recurso - artículo - Estado - versión publicada - Descripción - It has been determined the concentration of fourteen micro and macrominerals (Al, Ca, Co, Cr, Cu, Fe, K, Li, Mg, Mn, Na, P, Se, and Zn) in both crude drugs and infusions from regional markets, in San Luis province (Argentina). The estimated daily intake was compared with current recommendations. All products and its infusions were included within the upper tolerable limits for minerals, in trace elements such as toxic elements present at low levels.
